subject: Medicine
title: The Future of Personalized Medicine
description: A quick win: understand The Future of Personalized Medicine.

hook.text: Two patients take the same drug. One is cured. The other gets deadly side effects. Same disease, same pill.

buildup.text: Personalized medicine uses genetics, lifestyle, and biomarkers to tailor treatments to each individual.

discovery.text: Pharmacogenomics can predict which drugs will work for you and which ones your body can't process.

twist.text: Personalized medicine is expensive. The risk is a two-tier system where only the wealthy benefit.

climax.text: As costs drop, the goal is medicine designed for your biologyâ€”not the average patient.

punchline.text: The future of medicine is as unique as you are.

quiz.question: What does pharmacogenomics predict?
options: Which drugs will work based on your genetic profile
How much a drug will cost at the pharmacy
Whether a disease is contagious or not
